attributes.action: rename the 'Health and Safety Executive' as the 'Department of Common Sense'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is now, and has always been, very little  between Common Sense and Health & Safety, so why not simplify life by renaming the "Health & Safety Executive" as the "Department of Common Sense"

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
